non-staple foods/(Tw) solids (food for infants other than breast milk and formula)

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2
containing_words.word: 國家食品藥品監督管理局

pinyin: Shi2 you2 Huan4 Shi2 pin3 Xiang4 mu4
shi2 pin3 yao4 pin3 jian1 du1 ju2
Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2

definition: contaminated food product unscrupulously marketed as wholesome

sentences.english: How do you find an ‘Island of Misfit Foods’ near you?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何尋找周圍的“非適當食品小島”的呢？

sentences.english: Holiday makers travelling in Shanghai must taste raw-fried steam bread.
sentences.chinese: 生煎饅頭是遊客在上海旅行必嘗的食品。

sentences.english: Nutrition for Foodservice and Culinary Professionals, Study Guide, 6th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 食品服務和廚房專家所需營養，研究指導，第六版。

sentences.english: Bio Foods Co. , Ltd. Zibo Longbao company.
sentences.chinese: 淄博龍寶生物食品有限公司公司。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, Edward was very fond of cooking and foodstuff.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，愛德華非常喜歡烹飪和食品。

sentences.english: Sales of a variety of consumer-related products are gaining steadily.
sentences.chinese: 各種消費食品的銷售在穩步上升。

sentences.english: They are strictly vegetarian and eat all manner of deep fried food.
sentences.chinese: 他們是嚴格的食素者，喫各種各樣的油炸食品。

sentences.english: How do you really know what goes into store-bought baby food?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼真的知道什麼進店買嬰兒食品呢？

sentences.english: Be strictly compliance with laws and regulations, and to ensure food safety from product design.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格遵守法律法規，食品安全從產品設計抓起。

sentences.english: Some additives and preservatives are essential to keep foods quality and freshness.
sentences.chinese: 一些添加劑和防腐劑都必須保持食品的品質與鮮度。

sentences.english: The amount of pesticides present as residues on food is miniscule.
sentences.chinese: 食品上的農藥殘餘量總量其實是很少的。

sentences.english: Relaxing foods can enhance your mood and state of mind.
sentences.chinese: 放鬆食品可以改善你的情緒和精神狀態。

sentences.english: Goose is a grass - eating poultry, and goose is a kind of modern healthy food.
sentences.chinese: 鵝是食草家禽，鵝肉屬現代健康食品。

sentences.english: The new policy on food price will hurt the interest of people on low incomes.
sentences.chinese: 新的食品價格政策將傷害到低收入人羣的利益。

sentences.english: Zongzi is an essential food of the Dragon Boat Festival.
sentences.chinese: 糉子是端午節的一個必備食品。

sentences.english: The government rationed food to the public in wartime.
sentences.chinese: 在戰爭時期政府對民衆實行食品定量供應。

definition: non-staple foods/(Tw) solids (food for infants other than breast milk and formula)
